description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Develop and execute the sales plan and budget for the modern trade channel with the modern trade team and oversee the team
              
              •	Ensure the KPI’s are met for both marketing and distribution execution in modern trade and South
              
              •	Relationship building at all customer levels
              
              •	Key account negotiation
              
              •	TET planning and execution
              
              •	Cohesive relationships with customers, principles and internal departments in executing programs and following policies and procedures
              
              •	Monitor brand performance using sales, financial and market data and recommend appropriate action
              
              •	Ensure spend is in line with budget
              
              •	To effectively develop the capability of your team
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - High level of English written and spoken
              
              - Graduate in marketing or business from an international university course
              
              - At least 4-5 years in a sales role in FMCG, Baby Milk Product advantage.
              
              - Flexible working time.
              
              - Good communication and negotiation with customers in different levels
              
              - Excellent relationship and networking skills, planning skills
              
              - Highly self-motivated and result oriented
              
              - Independent in job handling and cooperate well with other colleagues in different sections.
